  • Uses of JsonValue in com.eclipsesource.json

    Subclasses of JsonValue in com.eclipsesource.json
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    JsonArray
    Represents a JSON array, an ordered collection of JSON values.
    class 
    JsonObject
    Represents a JSON object, a set of name/value pairs, where the names are strings and the values are JSON values.
